item.description:
Thursday, November 20, 2008

Cambridge

BIG BROTHER COMES TO CAMBRIDGE

What you should know about Department of Homeland Security Surveillance Cameras in Cambridge. Join the ACLU of Massachusetts for a discussion of why Big Brother might be a dangerous neighbor.

6:30-8PM
YWCA, Sylvia Room 7 at Temple Street, off Mass Ave in Central Square

For more information: call (617) 482-3170 x 314 or email nmurray@aclum.org.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: BIG BROTHER COMES TO CAMBRIDGE
